Title: Personalizer
Description:
[url=https://github.com/pkhead/rw-personalized]GitHub[/url]

This is a mod that personalizes your Rain World experience using state-of-the-art AI.
[h2]FAQ[/h2]
[b]Q: Where does my personal information come from?[/b]

The personal information we use to enhance your Rain World experience comes from our benefactors.

[b]Q: Who are your benefactors?[/b]

Our benefactors are people who support this project and are generous enough to provide us money.

[b]Q: Who specifically are your benefactors?[/b]

Our benefactors are people who support this project and are generous enough to provide us money.

[b]Q: What are the names of your benefactors?[/b]

Our benefactors are people who support this project and are generous enough to provide us money.

[b]Q: you're not answering my question[/b]

Server error
[h2]Features[/h2]
No, this mod doesn't actually personalize your Rain World experience using state-of-the-art A.I (...yet). I'm just having too much fun writing this description. In actuality, it just does various miscellaneous things. Current features include:
[list]
[*] Blue Lizards, Caramel Lizards, and Grapple Worms have a chance to be "shiny" (i.e., differently colored)
[*] Shiny bluefruit which gives you more food pips if eaten
[*] You may encounter "Larry" (configurable through Spawn Chance in the Remix config)
[/list]
In the future I may add more funny miscellaneous things.
